alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Washtenaw County through 800 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Brooklyn, or 10 miles west of Manchester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manchester around 725 PM EDT. Ann Arbor and Saline around 745 PM EDT. Milan around 750 PM EDT. Ypsilanti around 755 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bridgewater, Pittsfield Township, Pleasant Lake and Whittaker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
